properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 7:16PM CST until February 20 at 8:07PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Gainesville
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock
and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall earlier this week is resulting in high water levels
along the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* until Thursday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  7:00 PM Saturday the stage was 116.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 101.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 116.5 feet by
tomorrow early afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage
Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 117.5 feet...Flooding of some secondary homes upstream
in the Panola and Warsaw areas occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
